Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Annex A.14: recording token was returned

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: A.14 is failed
Test.Description: Annex A.14: recording token was not returned

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message.

Test.Name: No CreateTrackResponse message

Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong Topic

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="TrackToken"
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with Name="TrackToken"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for not existing RecordingToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for not existing RecordingToken

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
RECORDING-5-1-16 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
STEP 1 - Get Recording Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://192.168.10.76:82/ServiceRecording10/RecordingService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Recording Control service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that Recording service is accessible STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Recordings Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Get Recording Options (token = 'recording002') Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Create track for recording with token = 'recording002' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Get Event service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 10 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 11 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 12 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 13 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 14 - Delete track with token = 'BonusTrack' for recording with token = 'recording002' Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Check that a maximum number of 2 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Check that a maximum number of 2 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Checking that all required notifications are received Not all required notifications are received No notification for the following track RecordingToken = 'recording002', TrackToken = 'BonusTrack' STEP FAILED
STEP 24 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
